[00:00.00]Broken Clocks (Clean) - SZA
[00:08.63]Written by：SZA
[00:17.27]Run fast from my day job
[00:18.65]
[00:19.22]Runnin' fast from the way it was
[00:21.23]Jump quick to a pay check
[00:23.33]Runnin' back to the strip club
[00:25.36]I'm never going back never going back
[00:27.40]

[00:32.34]They never take me
[00:34.00]I've paid enough of petty dues
[00:36.02]I've had enough of s**tty news
[00:38.14]I've had a thing for dirty shoes since I was 10
[00:41.13]Love dirty men alike
[00:42.17]
[00:43.15]Ooooh
[00:43.92]

[00:46.71]
